definition: to cup one's hands in salute/to surround/to arch/to dig earth with the snout/arched
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

sentences.chinese: 渴望向上拱卫着神的宝座。

sentences.english: Green dragon protect thousands of miles of railway line, from east to west winds away.
sentences.chinese: 绿色巨龙拱卫中的千里铁道线，自东向西蜿蜒而去。

definition: (of troops stationed in a strategic area) to defend/(fig.) to stand guard/to protect
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
to hold a pass/to guard (a strategic location)
to govern/to have complete control over/to be in command of
defense of the imperial palace or of the capital/the palace guard (or a member of that unit)
to guard/to hold a fortified position/entrenched
